HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
A new mod for the Giddy-up! Series is released!
I am proud to present Giddy-up! Caravan. With this mod you can let your colonists ride to far lands on elephants, muffalos, lamas or any other animal, modded or not! You can find it on steam, or on the mod's page on Ludeon forums.
